title: Regarding Internships and Placement.....
content: If suppose i get a an Internship in my summer after 6th sem and they offer me a PPO of 13LPA..... Will PESU Placement Cell doesn't allow me to sit for placements of tier 1 that is above 12LPA companies......

comments.body: If you accept an on-campus PPO you wouldn't be allowed to sit for placements.
You can, but PES allows you to receive at most 2 offers. So it'll count against one of your received offers. If you reject another offer after that, you're out of placements
Thank you so much for the info !
